description: Since 1994, we have been Toronto's leading tour operator for Niagara Falls tours. Our 1-day tours depart from Toronto and Mississauga and take guests on a bucket-list adventure to the breathtaking waterfalls. We use mini-coaches to make sure passengers have an intimate and fun experience with a small group. Our fleet is well-maintained and climate-controlled. Our thousands of online reviews showcase our high standards for our tour guides to deliver a fun, memorable and captivating experience. Enjoy a smooth and easy experience from the minute you book and connect with our customer service reps, to the minute we drop you off back to Toronto.

reviews.title: Amazing 10/10 Caleb was amazing
text: Caleb was amazing ! Great guide give him a raise ! Really informative it was like a bus tour but you get to have the experience of all the attractions under his guidance super informative

reviews.title: A fantastic trip, you must do this!
text: My husband and I went on the tour this week. Tracy, our driver and guide was fabulous. Tracy text us with an eta before pick up and collected us on time. During the tour she was really informative and knowledgeable. The whole day went so smoothly. We had a chance to stop at the whirlpool and Maple Leaf place along the way. We took so many photos, and the views of the falls were fantastic. We had plenty time to ourselves before leaving on time. Really great value trip; you should definitely consider doing this tour and with this operator. Thank you for an amazing day!

reviews.title: Great experience with Queens Tour
text: Once again, I'm grateful for Queen's Tours' impeccable service and Tracy's expertise as our tour guide. She knows Niagara well and ensured we covered every stop on our itinerary.

reviews.title: Wonderful Experience
text: Great trip with a very knowledgeable guide. The views were amazing and the boat trip into the falls was a stunning experience. The trip from Toronto to Niagara was well-organised and was an interesting way to see the surrounding area. We would highly recommend this trip.

reviews.title: Amazing TIME SOLO
text: John from queens tour was amazing very very friendly and he took care of all. Of use making sure we have fun. I will highly recommend it!

reviews.title: Niagara Falls Day Tour with John

Full of wonderful information, tips and humour!
He is a real credit to your company.
Thank you John, we had a great day and you.looked after us all so well.

reviews.title: Niagara
text: Adam H was the best guide possible! Going to niagara is one of the best things ever!
I truly recommend this company to go to.

reviews.title: Best trip!
text: This trip was fabulous, and our guide, John, was great. He was warm and friendly, and he kept us entertained with lots of interesting facts on our bus ride out to the Falls. John was very knowledgeable!
The Falls were breathtaking! Everyone needs to see them, the boat ride up to the Falls was exhilarating, we loved it.
100% recommend this trip !

reviews.title: Day trip to Niagara.
text: Great day traveling out to Niagara Falls with Queen bus Tours. The boat ride was invigorating and truly amazing. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Tour that I would do again and spend more time in Niagara on the lake.
text: Our driver, tour guide (Adam Nice was doing both) he was attentive, funny and made sure to show special place that we wouldn’t know to look for. Thank you Adam Nice for à mémorable tour.

reviews.title: Informative and hassle free
text: Tour was really worth doing and such an easy way to see everything without the hassle of driving ourselves. Tracy our tour guide made the day with her informative commentaries and bubbly personality.

reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
text: My daughter booked this tour for herself and I as my birthday treat while we were visiting Niagara in early September, following some lovely emails back and forth between myself and Eden E, Queen Tours Office Manager, who was prompt in answering my queries and informed me of all the tour details.
As we were staying in Niagara Falls itself, we were last to be collected. The tour operator kept us informed of the pick up as there was a small delay due to traffic from Toronto.

Mr Nice the driver was very welcoming, happy and extremely knowledgeable (Nice by name and definitely by nature!) As we drove, Mr Nice kept up a very interesting and informative commentary about the Fall’s history and facts.

The whirlpool area was fantastic, the maple syrup tasting was fabulous, the boat trip was awesome, the meal was amazing and being able to control the lights on the falls just rounded up an absolutely incredible day.
I couldn’t have asked for more to make my birthday so perfect and defiantly one to remember. Thank you so much.

reviews.title: With Kaleb to the Niagara falls
text: Kaleb was a really great and fun guy who drove us to the Niagara Falls and told us many good information ! Always book it again with him.

reviews.title: Out of this world tour
text: Amazing tour and a very knowledgeable guide Kaleb, it was beyond my expectations. The tour behind de falls was great but the boat ride was something out of this wirld. Our driver was kind enough to arrange for a partner, Andrew also very kind, to pick us up from the behind the falls point to go to the boat ride. Thank you for such a great experience

reviews.title: A must do day trip to Niagara Falls
text: The tour guide (the greek one) was very kind, accommodating and very knowledgeable about the subject of history and current state of Toronto, Niagara falls and the soroundings and much more. The falls were much better than expected. In the between activities we have some free time which was also nice. Maple syrup is delicious.

reviews.title: Peace of mind.
text: Views were great, and Adam the driver was knowledgable in telling us where we should go for the best evening views etc. It was a smooth drive there and back. Would have liked some more history on niagara Falls as we were travelling from a different country. The trip offers you peace of mind, no queuing for tickets as Adam sorted it all. It would have been nice to include the whirlpool as part of the tour. It would be very popular!

reviews.title: Kaleb at Queen’s Tours was a star!!
text: We had Kaleb as our driver and tour guide and we loved his commentary and looking after us and answered our questions about his commentary. We were picked up at one of the available locations and we bought the boat ride tour and the behind the falls tour - these are must sees to get the whole experience.

reviews.title: Great day
text: Our driver Tracy brought us safe to the falls and back. We got a little sightseeing and our tickets for the boat and had plenty of time to walk around Niagara.

reviews.title: Queen tour of Niagara Falls!
text: Tracy did a fabulous job on our tour. Highly recommend Queen tour as a great way to see Niagara Falls! Tracy made sure our trip was efficient and on time!

reviews.title: Highly Recommend
text: Tracy was an amazing g tour guide.  She made sure everyone was where they needed to be, and you could tell she really loves her job.  I highly recommend

reviews.title: A fabulous day
text: We've just had a fabulous day. Our guide Andrew was friendly and very knowledgeable. He made the journey go quickly by telling us lots of information about Canada and the areas that we passed through. Niagra Falls was amazing and being able to skip the line onto the boat was great. An experience to remember. Plus added extras like tasting maple syrup and view stop off points were good too. It was my husband's birthday and Andrew got the other tourists to sing happy birthday at my request which was even more special. Thank you. Can definitely recommend this trip.

reviews.title: Niagara Falls - Exactly what you want from a trip
text: Firstly - Tour Guide Andrew. What a brilliant tour guide. He was incredibly knowledgeable about more than just the falls. He gave intermittent and informative commentary throughout the journey which broke up what could have been a monotonous ride and made it enjoyable. Top marks Andrew 10/10.

The tour was well organised and the stops en route were well timed and gave opportunities to explore. The boat trip itself is exactly what you want. Can’t say more than that. (Bring a waterproof even though they provide ponchos).
The town of Niagara is wild. If you’ve been to the UK it’s like Blackpool and Brighton had a love child and it grew up on a diet of sugar.
Queen Tour - well organised, punctual, and fairly priced.
Thank you!
Oli & Lauren

reviews.title: A fabulous day trip to Niagara
text: Queen Tours Niagara was recommended by family and it lived up to expectations. Our guide, John, was excellent and very informative and had a great knowledge both of Toronto and the many sights along the route to Niagara. He was patient and very friendly. A great ambassador for Queen Tours.

reviews.title: The best way to ‘do’ Niagara!
text: Grand day out!  John was very knowledgeable, helpful and a real gentleman.  The weather helped too.  I only took the boat ride but several other options were easily available.  Overall a very well organised, easy and extremely enjoyable.

reviews.title: Wet day in Niagara
text: It was a rainy cold day when we visited but we still had an amazing day. John the guide was very informative and helpful. There were plenty of options to choose if we wanted extras. We didn't, but enjoyed the day very much.

reviews.title: Niagara Falls
text: From start to finish the day was well organised.  John was a fantastic guide with lots of local knowledge.  He was also very helpful! Would definitely recommend

reviews.title: Not to be missed
text: The views were amazing. The actual activity was unbelievable and definitely something not to be missed!! We had a great day and really enjoyed ourselves.

I would definitely suggest doing the boat tour, As it gives you an amazing view of the falls while inside the basin. But I would definitely recommend taking a spare change of trousers as you definitely do get wet. The only issue we really had was the bottom of our jeans and our shoes.

That being said, we didn’t stop at half of the places listed on the description. And when we did stop at two areas, we were not permitted to exit the bus so did not get to enjoy The full extent of the view. When having to do this members on the other side of the bus, we’re not able to take the full view or get any pictures. While the tour guide was pleasant, he did not seem well rehearsed in his facts and stories. We felt that the Guide talked a little bit too much and some of the facts and stories were not relevant.

Overall, we had an amazing time, The sides we saw or not to be missed and major a huge part of our trip to Toronto. I would definitely still recommend, but would also suggest bringing some headphones.

reviews.title: Best night tour of the Falls
text: This was an amazing tour was kind of sceptical at first but bus arrived on time Adam Nice our drive was the best took time with us and explained a lot of history very knowledgeable would do it again in a heart beat

reviews.title: Awesome Niagara tour
text: In Toronto for a spots event and decided to go to Niagara for the day. Best decision ever.  Our tour guide John was amazing. So Knowledgeable and the kindest person ever.
Going on the Maid of the Mist was unbelievable, an experience everyone should try at least once. You feel like you can almost touch the falls!

reviews.title: Great tour, do it!!
text: Tour was great! We all enjoyed the day! Tracy is an excellent guide, friendly, kind and informative.  Great memory of the FALLS!

reviews.title: Beautiful fall day in Niagara!
text: Bus was clean and on time for our pickup.  Our guide Kaleb was knowledgeable about Toronto and kept us informed.  It was a beautiful fall day and we enjoyed the free time in Niagara.  Maple tasting was interesting.  All in all, it was a great trip but i was disappointed by how touristy it was, most notably "Little Vegas".  I guess I would have expected it from the American side, thought the Canucks had more class.
The falls, however, did not disappoint and were well worth the trip.

I was shocked at the amount of traffic there...had no idea.  It was literally  bumper to bumper going in and out of Toronto...therefore, we were a little delayed both ways.  Just be aware there are conditions beyond their control.

reviews.title: Excellent Niagra Falls Trip from Toronto
text: Well organised trip. Delightful guide John who not only managed the day well and without a rush but gave an informative commentary from Toronto to the Falls. Saw all the major sights, an amazing experience. Boat trip well worth doing. Plenty of time to just look at the spectacular falls. At this time of year too the colour of the  trees added to the splendour. Well recommend the trip.

reviews.title: Queen Tour
text: A real quality service.
John was an excellent host, very informative and friendly. This tour was more than I was expecting and the falls are well worth a visit. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.title: Best of Toronto tour!
text: One of my favorite tour I did is this one, all people are so kind to me and guide is very informative, loud for all the tourist get the chance to hear from him.
I highly recommend this tour!

reviews.title: Great!
text: Kaleb was so much fun and really knowledgeable about the area and the history of the Falls. I would definitely book with them again!

reviews.title: Thoroughly worthwhile!
text: This was a really good trip and well worth the money. The extra attractions at the Flower Clock and the Maple Leaf shop were worth the stop but the undoubted highlight were the Falls themselves. In a word - awesome! We felt that the four hours given were perfect as this enabled us to do the trip behind the falls, the boat trip on the Hornblower, then get a nice meal afterwards. There were some slight issues with tickets but overall, Kaleb did an excellent job with a great running commentary.

reviews.title: Has Room for Improvement
text: Tour was generally was well-designed and well-organized and relatively cheaper than others. But the one thing that could really really be improved is the Tour guide Adam Nice.

1. Joined a tour where majority of the participants are asians and he would make snide comments to the few european and americans about how we are outnumbered in a weird sarcastic tone. Firstly, none of us seemed to mind them. So I don't understand why he repeatedly said this as each caucasian joined the van at the beginning. I just smiled awkwardly. Like why is race such a big thing?

2. At the very beginning of the trip, he mentioned to the whole group a quick anecdote about how asians usually don't tip but recently 2 hong kong ladies were so impressed by him that they gave him $100 and he's hoping to get high tips again from the hong kong group (family of 4; coincidentally there were also 2 asian ladies (not sure what country; probably thai or viet in the van). Just rubbed me the wrong way.

3. He gave free candies to the group emphasizing that "this did not come from my boss; it came from me". Literally just candies candies. Not even water or anything fancier but he had to let us know for him to get tips.

4. At night, he gave out postcards. One for each. Except for the hong kong group which he initially only wanted to give 1. He asked how many they want, one of them said 4 (one for each family member) but he only gave them 2. Like, dude, you were asking for a huge tip at the beginning of the trip but you are so stingy with those cheap-ass postcards? Why??

5. Had a miscommunication with an american couple who were part of the group and he broadcasted their whole story (and how they were crying and distraught) to the whole group while the couple were not yet there. That is soooo unprofessional. We didn't need to know what happened. Just say there's been a miscommunication. End of story.

He really didn't explain much about the places or interacted with us. I feel like maybe he's not trying because the group has more asians than caucasians (but the asians seem to be able to understand and speak english perfectly). No enthusiasm at all.

To the management, I'm sure you will be defensive (as I see in your replies to other less-than-positive reviews) and say that Adam Nice is a veteran tour guide with many many positive reviews - what I'm sharing is my experience so please don't try to discredit or disregard it. I hope to see some accountability and true commitment in training your tour guides to be more professional and more sensitive to other cultures.

In my opinion, the tour was nice enough (well-organized, stuck to schedule, no mishaps)  but just the tour guide soured the experience so I'm still giving it a 3/5. There are surely better tours out there.

Note: i learned today that Google shadow removes some reviews and it happens to so many people (whether the review is positive or negative - see reddit for people who experienced this) so don't trust Google Reviews!

reviews.title: I want to comeback!
text: The tour was amazing!! John, our guide was so kind, he did his best for us, always giving us the best tips to enjoy the day. I really recommend this tour, if you go please do everything, you will enjoy it.

reviews.title: One life time experience
text: An incredible experience! I highly recommend it. Andrew was a fantastic guide with a great sense of humor. Communication was excellent, and pick-up and drop-off were punctual. I enjoyed my time.
Be sure to take the boat trip – it’s absolutely worth it!

reviews.title: Stunning experience with a great guide!
text: Absolutely amazing tour to Niagara Falls with "King" Kaleb. The tour was very well organised and made for an amazing experience. Kaleb was extremely knowledgeable and passed this information on throughout the tour which helped enhance the experience further. If you are planning a trip to Niagara Falls I'd definitely recommend Kaleb and the tour operator.
Many thanks
Kimberley Kenny and Matthew Kenny
